1Life Sessions and Facilities

Near real-time availability and rich descriptions of the sessions and facilities available from 1Life, published using OpenActive RPDE 1.0 and Model 2.0.

Near real-time availability and rich descriptions relating to the sessions and facilities available from 1Life, published using the OpenActive Modelling Specification 2.0, and covering a rolling lookhead window of the next 6 days.
